title: What the HELL
body: bro, thats unfair asf, your game takes so long to give me the option to ban a champ, when i select champ, it freezes, then responds when i have like 6 seconds to ban champ, and as im spamming ban, it goes back to lobby screen and gives me 30 min ban..... thats fucked up. everything runs smooth right up to when i get to ba, then it all starts spazzing out and wont let me ban, yet i get punished for something i didnt do, just as messed up as the report/banning system. riot has alot of issues with their game, but hey, lets just punish the player becuase our game fucks out.

replies.body: I can't give you specifics on how to fix it, since I'm no wrenchman, but it sounds like either a connection issue or bugged client files. Try repairing your client and see if it fixes.
